mapper.sql: select r_book_no , count(r_book_no) as viewCnt from web_app_test2.tb_book_view group by r_book_no
mapper.select:
/* 전체 책 개수 조회 쿼리 */
select count(*) from web_app_test2.tb_book where use_yn = 'y'

/* 핫한 책 리스트 조회 쿼리 */
select tb_b.r_book_no as bookNo , tb_b.title as bookTitle , tb_b.author as bookAuthor , tb_b.link as link , tb_b_t.tag_korean_name as bookTypeKorean , tb_b_t.tag_english_name as bookTypeEnglish , ifnull(tb_b_v.viewCnt, 0) as viewCnt , tb_b_t_i.web_thumbnail_url as webThumbnailUrl , date_format(tb_b.book_reg_dt, '%Y-%m-%d') as bookRegDt , date_format(tb_b.reg_dt, '%Y-%m-%d') as regDt from web_app_test2.tb_book as tb_b inner join web_app_test2.tb_book_type as tb_b_t on tb_b.r_book_type_no = tb_b_t.r_book_type_no left outer join () as tb_b_v on tb_b.r_book_no = tb_b_v.r_book_no left outer join web_app_test2.tb_book_thumbnail_img as tb_b_t_i on tb_b.r_book_no = tb_b_t_i.r_book_no where tb_b.use_yn = 'y' order by tb_b.reg_dt desc

/* 전체 책 리스트 조회 쿼리 */
select tb_b.r_book_no as bookNo , tb_b.m_n_no as madeNatureNo , tb_b_t.tag_korean_name as bookTypeKorean , tb_b_t.tag_english_name as bookTypeEnglish , tb_b.title as bookTitle , tb_b.author as bookAuthor , tb_b.link as link , tb_b.use_yn as bookUseYnEnum , date_format(tb_b.book_reg_dt, '%Y-%m-%d') as bookRegDt , date_format(tb_b.reg_dt, '%Y-%m-%d') as regDt from web_app_test2.tb_book as tb_b inner join web_app_test2.tb_book_type as tb_b_t on tb_b.r_book_type_no = tb_b_t.r_book_type_no where tb_b.use_yn = 'y' order by reg_dt desc

/* 단일 책 상세 정보 조회 쿼리 */
select tb_b.r_book_no as bookNo , tb_b.m_n_no as madeNatureNo , tb_b_t.tag_korean_name as bookTypeKorean , tb_b_t.tag_english_name as bookTypeEnglish , tb_b.title as bookTitle , tb_b.author as bookAuthor , tb_b.link as link , tb_b.use_yn as bookUseYnEnum , ifnull(tb_b_v.viewCnt, 0) as viewCnt , tb_b_t_i.web_thumbnail_url as webThumbnailUrl , date_format(tb_b.book_reg_dt, '%Y-%m-%d') as bookRegDt , date_format(tb_b.reg_dt, '%Y-%m-%d') as regDt from web_app_test2.tb_book as tb_b inner join web_app_test2.tb_book_type as tb_b_t on tb_b.r_book_type_no = tb_b_t.r_book_type_no left outer join () as tb_b_v on tb_b.r_book_no = tb_b_v.r_book_no left outer join web_app_test2.tb_book_thumbnail_img as tb_b_t_i on tb_b.r_book_no = tb_b_t_i.r_book_no where tb_b.use_yn = 'y' and tb_b.r_book_no = #{bookNo}
